text: Romeo and Juliet () is a 1955 Soviet movie directed by Lev Arnshtam and Leonid Lavrovsky.Московский кинотеатр покажет лучшие экранизации "Ромео и Джульетты"РОМЕО И ДЖУЛЬЕТТА (1954) It stars Galina Ulanova, Yuri Zhdanov, and I. Olenina. ==Actors== * Galina Ulanova as Juliet * Yuri Zhdanov as Romeo (as Yu. Zhdanov) * I. Olenina as Juliet's nurse * Aleksandr Radunsky as Lord Capulet (as A. Radunsky) * Ye. Ilyushchenko as Lady Capulet * Aleksey Yermolayev as Tybalt == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1950s musical movies Category:1955 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies based on Romeo and Juliet Category:Movies directed by Lev Arnshtam Category:Movies directed by Leonid Lavrovsky
title: Romeo and Juliet (1955 movie)
